name: Hidden Objects Tropical Island
summary: Find the hidden objects on this beautiful tropical island, exploring land, sea, and air.  Game is re-playable multiple times, with object locations shuffled. Includes (family-friendly) Jamie Dornan tribute. Helicopter, submarine, wolf, sheriff's car, wooden sword, ice cream cone, and more.  Full version; no ads; no IAPs; no data collected about you nor your device. Just plain fun!
